column4: ok I have hit a snagg installing some games... I'm installing The Orange Box (which is 2 DVD's) using WINE. It's gone Ok up to the point where I need to switch to Disc 2. I have tried to kick out Disc 1 but I get and error. "Cannot unmount volume | An application is preventing the volume 'Orange Box' from being unmounted." is the error message I am getting. How do I get the disc to eject and continue without interrupting the installat
ion? there must be away, right?...
